name: Times is
description:
The studio is working with game developer Metal Gear Solid studio Platinum Games and producer of the Ninja Gaiden series Blue Moon Beast Studios.
The game is based on the legendary real-time strategy (RTS) strategy game Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.[12] It features the classic space battles of the Star Wars franchise, as well as the epic wipeout sequence of the Old Republic. The developers also hope to make the game available for Android devices in the coming months. In the game, players will pilot a mysterious alien ship on a journey across the galaxy. The game will feature multiple levels of difficulty. Earlier this year, Rishikesh-based developer Prefect Software announced a Star Wars game, which will launch later this year. In 2012, Outhouse Media released Star Wars: The Old Republic, a role-playing game originally developed for handheld devices. In 2013, Outhouse received the release of a spinoff, Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Old Republic.[13] Check out the video below for more details on TIS, and learn more about Platinum GmbH's upcoming game: Notes
